alert.note: Alert for St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 5:00PM EDT until June 20 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central St. Johns County in northeastern Florida... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 500 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near World Golf Village, or 11 miles west of Saint Augustine, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, World Golf Village, South Ponte Vedra, Vilano Beach, Guana River State Park, Bakersville and South Ponte Vedra Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
